page.title: 06LEISURE TIME
page.content:
IN MY SPARE TIME, I LIKE LISTENING TO POP MUSIC.MY FAVOURITE GROUPS ARE 'WHAM' AND 'DURAN DURAN'.I ALSO BELONG TO THE 1ST SHINFIELD GUIDES.WE MEET EVERY TUESDAY EVENING FROM 6.30PM UNTIL 7.30PM.WE SOMETIMES GO ON TRIPS;FOR INSTANCE,TO LONDON,SWIMMING AND ICE-SKATING.WE ALSO GO TO CAMP ONCE A YEAR.
ANOTHER PLACE I LIKE GOING TO IS READING AND LOOKING AROUND THE SHOPS.I OCCASIONALLY GO SWIMMING AT THE CENTRAL POOL.I ALSO ENJOY ICE-SKATING, AT RICHMOND OR SOUTHAMTON,EVEN THOUGH I DO NOT GO VERY OFTEN.IF I DO GO IT IS EITHER WITH THE SCHOOL OR THE GUIDES.I SOMETIMES GO ON CYCLE RIDES IN THE COUNTRYSIDE WITH MY FRIENDS.
